planet.name: Kepler-18 b
KOI-137 b
KOI-137.03
GSC 03149-02089 b
KIC 8644288 b
2MASS J19521906+4444467 b
planet.description: The Kepler-18 system is hosting at least three transiting planets. It was discovered with the Kepler satellite, and confirmed by a combination of large transit-timing variations, radial-velocity variations, Warm-Spitzer observations, and a statistical analysis of false-positive probabilities.
